title: Voxiversities are up again
author: VD
content_html:
One step at a time. The techs are still making infrastructure changes, so if something isn’t working properly, please don’t email me, just wait a few hours and try again. Also, please note that the fact that the screen still says “Login” does not mean you are not logged in. It is an inability to play a paywalled video that indicates you are not logged in.

As noted in the title, all 12 Voxiversities are now playable and downloadable again. I hope to record one or two new ones this weekend, time permitting.

Chuck Dixon on Comics #16 is now up as well, featuring his fascinating recounting of the history of the GI JOE franchise.
